title: MBTI Visualizer
summary: The purpose of this web application is to provide an efficient method of explaining the MBTI system and how the 3 core components interact with each other: the cognitive preferences, the cognitive functions, and the order of the cognitive functions
description: Different data structures are utilized in the JavaScript to model the behaviors and constraints of the MBTI system. AngularJS then binds the user selections to those data structures to validate/process the selections. Uses jQuery mainly for accessing/modifying CSS classes on DOM elements. Uses CSS grid and media queries for responsiveness
future-work: Consider making a guided selection application which allows the user to make selections on any of the 3 core components of the MBTI system. This was avoided due to scope concerns regarding complexity
